archimate:Assessment.name: The current Offering oriented delivery is too rigid.
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
This is according to Michael Lenahan in the Tech Services All-Hands Call 2023-06-01 and is not the way to work going forward according to him.
When an organization is "offering oriented", it tends to focus on delivering specific products or services. While this approach can be successful, it can also be rigid and limit the organization's ability to respond to changing market demands or technological developments.
